org.nd4j.linalg.dataset.api.preprocessor

Class NormalizerStandardize

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.linalg.dataset.api.preprocessor.AbstractNormalizer
      • org.nd4j.linalg.dataset.api.preprocessor.AbstractDataSetNormalizer<DistributionStats>
        • org.nd4j.linalg.dataset.api.preprocessor.NormalizerStandardize
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, DataSetPreProcessor, DataNormalization, Normalizer<DataSet>

    public class NormalizerStandardize
extends AbstractDataSetNormalizer<DistributionStats>
    Created by susaneraly, Ede Meijer variance and mean Pre processor for DataSet that normalizes feature values (and optionally label values) to have 0 mean and a standard deviation of 1
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
